Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Pirates and slavers are controlling the slave market in the southeast of Mistmoor Island.

Clear out the {@LinkCreature:12#13#Red Lash clawriders}. The {@LinkCreature:12#14#gula traffickers} are also targets, but the clawriders are the area's heavy hitters.

Report to Coordinator Lisel when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
